import { Component, useEffect } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import { leaveFunctions } from "./leaveMainFunction"; import $ from "jquery"; import "jquery-ui/ui/widgets/datepicker"; import "jquery-ui/themes/base/all.css"; export class leaveMain extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.refreshlist = this.refreshlist.bind(this); this.handleDatechange = this.handleDatechange.bind(this); this.state = { blockedDates: ["2023-05-15", "2023-05-20", "2023-05-25"], userData: [], agmUnit: "", dgmUnit: "", serviceUnit: "", username: "", }; } componentDidMount() { this.refreshlist(); this.setupDatePicker(); var report = document.getElementById("medicalFile"); var priorlist = document.getElementById("priorDateList"); var leavelist = document.getElementById("leaveDateList"); var lieuPanel = document.getElementById("lieuPanel"); priorlist.style.display = "none"; lieuPanel.style.display = "none"; leavelist.style.display = "none"; report.disabled = true; } refreshlist() {} setupDatePicker() { var blockedDates = this.state.blockedDates; const datePickerOptions = { beforeShowDay: function (date) { const formattedDate = $.datepicker.formatDate("yy-mm-dd", date); const isBlocked = blockedDates.includes(formattedDate); const currentDate = new Date().setHours(0, 0, 0, 0); const isDisabled = date.getTime() < currentDate; return [!isBlocked && !isDisabled]; }.bind(this), // Binding the function to the component instance // Other datepicker options... }; $("#fromDate").datepicker(datePickerOptions); $("#toDate").datepicker(datePickerOptions); } formatDate(date) { var year = date.getFullYear(); var month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, "0"); var day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, "0"); return year + "-" + month + "-" + day; } render() { const { blockedDates, userData, agmUnit, dgmUnit, serviceUnit, username } = this.state; return (
